name: Uphill 4x4 Truck Driving
description:
Grab the steering of 4 wheeler offroad jeep tightly and go for extreme and ultimate Uphill Offroad driving adventures. Try Uphill 4x4 Truck Driving and become an actual and real jeep driver on lumpy and bumpy hilly roads of dangerous mountainous areas. bridges.

Features
- Realistic offraod Environment
- Awesome jeeps
- Smooth and easy Steering controls
- Detailed Interiors with Hand Animation
- Best 3D Parking game
- Realistic driving controls
- Animated people entering/exiting the bus
- Adventurous & Exciting levels
- 3D SUV direction pointer
- Different camera angles
